title: Wombat poop is cube-shaped!
content: Wombats, native to Australia, have uniquely structured intestines that shape their poop into little cubes . This unusual shape helps the poop stay in place , marking their territory and reducing the chances of it rolling away !

title: Donald Jr. Trump as next US President
content: Donald Trump has been named the next President of the United States , marking his return to the White House after his first term from 2017 to 2021. His leadership promises to bring a continuation of his "America First" policies , focusing on trade, immigration, and national security . The decision is set to ignite passionate debates on the direction of the country and its role on the global stage.
